Ear Plugs with Built-in LED Lights: Earplugs with built-in LED lights can be designed to provide a soft, ambient light that can help people relax or fall asleep. This feature can also be useful for people who work in dark environments or for those who want to block out the light while studying.

Ear Plugs with Built-in Music Player: Earplugs with a built-in music player can be designed to provide a personalized listening experience for the user. This feature can be especially useful for people who want to listen to music while working out or for those who want to block out the noise while studying.

Ear Plugs with Built-in Microphone: Earplugs with a built-in microphone can be designed to allow the user to make phone calls or listen to podcasts without having to remove the earplugs. This feature can be especially useful for people who work in noisy environments or for those who want to stay connected while working out.

Ear Plugs with Built-in Sensors: Earplugs with built-in sensors can be designed to monitor the user's heart rate, body temperature, and other vital signs. This feature can be especially useful for people who want to track their health and fitness while working out.

Ear Plugs with Built-in Voice Assistant: Earplugs with a built-in voice assistant can be designed to provide the user with hands-free access to their phone's features, such as setting reminders or making phone calls. This feature can be especially useful for people who want to stay connected while working out.
